This quiz will prompt you to search for information in the Processing Reference materials, an external website that contains lots of information about how to use different methods available to you in the Processing environment.

You should have the Processing Reference pulled up in a browser tab while you take this quiz so you can search for the answers on the site. Remember--no one remembers all this information; programmers (like you!) should always feel comfortable checking for information in documentation resources. It's not cheating; it's programming!
